result.execSummary:
The defendant Jonathan N Portillo was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Jonathan N Portillo is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Jonathan N Portillo was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).
  • Jonathan N Portillo was found guilty of Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: kmk
Ct.2 - Dismissed  kmk

Attorney Rosa Delgado appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney K Watson.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  On State's motion, ct 2 is dismissed.  Deft pleads guilty to cts 1 & 3.  Court finds deft guilty of cts 1 & 3.   PSI waived.  On ct 1 the court imposes a total fine/costs of $750, including DNA surcharge, on ct 3 the court imposes a total fine/costs of $750, including DNA surcharge; deft to submit DNA sample; bond applied to fine/costs.  Firearms warning given.

NO RECORD MADE.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney H Edwards.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Clerk contacts ADA Delgado by phone who states that an offer was made to deft.  Atty Watson states the deft wants time to consider the offer.  JS of 12/7/15 at 8:30am is removed from the calendar and a STC is set for 12/11/15 at 11am.  Bond continued.
With ADA Delgado and Atty Watson the JSH of 11/25/15 at 11am is rescheduled, as ADA Delgado will be off; reset to 11/24/15 at 8:15am.
With ADA Delgado and Atty Watson the JSH of 11/19/15 at 1:15pm is rescheduled, as the deft is unable to be writted for that date due to court in Milwaukee on 11/20; reset to 11/25/15 at 11am.

NO RECORD MADE.  Attorney Rosa Delgado appeared for the State.  Atty K Watson appeared on behalf of deft.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Deft in custody but not brought over.  Atty Watson states they are waiting to see what the status is of deft's Milwaukee case which is set for further hearing on 7/29/15.  STC continued to 8/27/15 at 8:30am.  Bond continued.

With Atty Watson and ADA Delgado the JSH of 6/25/15 at 1:15pm is removed from the calendar and the JS of 7/13/15 at 9am is changed to a STC as Atty Watson is unsure that the deft is wanting to proceed with a trial now.

Attorney Rosa Delgado appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney K Watson.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Ludwig hearing held.  JSH 6/25/15 at 1:15pm and JS 7/13/15 at 9am.  Bond continued.

Attorney Rosa Delgado appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney K Watson.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  For reasons set forth on the record, FPT continued to 2/19/15 at 1:15pm.  Bond continued.
